entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 a.m. PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Rainfall amount 20 mm near Fernie. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
